content: He can also wave the tongue-hand around in a haphazard fashion, making it weave in a large arc from side to side as it swipes at you three times, before rising high up to slam down at you (but you can use Rock Solid to send him tumbling back in surprise).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw', specifically from the subsection 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also wave the tongue-hand around in a haphazard fashion, making it weave in a large arc from side to side as it swipes at you three times, before rising high up to slam down at you (but you can use Rock Solid to send him tumbling back in surprise).
